text: Villafranca Piemonte is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin in the Piedmont region in Italy. It is about 35 km southwest of Turin. Villafranca Piemonte is next to these municipalities: Barge, Cardè, Cavour, Faule, Moretta, Pancalieri and Vigone. == Twin towns == Villafranca Piemonte is twinned with: * Belhomert-Guéhouville, France * El Trébol, Argentina * Saint- Maurice-Saint-Germain, France == References == Category:Comunes of Turin
title: Villafranca Piemonte
